author: chammers
msg: If the user tries to set an option via the config file that does
not exists it was silently ignored. Now an exception is raised
to give the user a hint where he made the error.

author: jbellis
msg: replace one-shot lock w/ synchronized block.  patch by jbellis

author: sf
msg: Work around broken cache management in mod_ldap: If LDAPSharedCacheSize is too
small, try to free some memory by purging the cache and log a warning.
Also increase the default LDAPSharedCacheSize to 500000. This is a more
realistic size suitable for the default values of 1024 for LdapCacheEntries and

author: chaase3
msg: DERBY-4377: Developer's Guide statement on shutting down Derby needs qualification
Modified topic to clarify authentication information.

author: sergeyb
msg: Making sure the osgi transport can be configured so that it does not impose a 'cxf' prefix on endpoint addresses
